translator
Interface Nameable

All Known Implementing Classes:
FormalParameterField, JavaClass, JavaField, JavaFile, JavaMethod
public interface Nameable

A standard way of accessing name information across various classes.

Method Summary

          Gets the fully qualified C++ name.

getName

getName

java.lang.String getName(boolean fullName)
Gets the java name.

Parameters:
fullName - True for the fully-qualified java name; false for just the last part of the name.
